ygData.messageBody:
> Correct me if I am wrong, but are you saying that spell
> research does not
> have a cap? You are mistaken if you think so. To be as objective as
> possible, I will detail the circumstances that convince me that spell
> research is capped per level.

This is from an email response I received from GZ - Geoffrey Zatkin, Arch
Mage of Norrath:

]
]
]> The conventional knowledge right now is that there is a skill cap of
]> (level-15)*5 for research. I really hope that this is not the case.
]>
]> Could you please quickly outline how research is supposed to work, and
]also
]> outline how guild practices work? Can we train up to this supposed level
]cap
]> at the magic users guild? or is there a magic number at which we can no
]> longer train - like trade skills (21)?
]>
]> Is research considered a trade skill or a casting skill?
]
] Research is more of a trade skill - I believe that the skill is NOT
]capped.
]
]


Although unrelated to tinkering, I thought you should be corrected on this
issue - if you dont beleive me, email GZ yourself - he is very forthcoming
and has ALWAYS replied to my emails.

Haxtonia Firewater, Wayward Gnomish Mage (Mith Marr)
